query:
SELECT 
  id, 
  customerEmail,
  serviceType,
  status,
  assignedSupplierId,
  SUBSTRING(siteAddress, 1, 40) as location
FROM jobs 
WHERE customerEmail = '12@customer.com' OR id IN (1, 2, 30001, 90001)
ORDER BY id
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PejtppQzUdF9US.e7bec8248b17 --database 2cukUCNz2S5THQpLSDbdYn --execute SELECT 
  id, 
  customerEmail,
  serviceType,
  status,
  assignedSupplierId,
  SUBSTRING(siteAddress, 1, 40) as location
FROM jobs 
WHERE customerEmail = '12@customer.com' OR id IN (1, 2, 30001, 90001)
ORDER BY id

rows.location: 123 Main St, San Francisco, CA 94105, US
